sentences.sContent: Paradoxically, the prohibition of liquor caused an increase in alcoholism.
sentences.sCn: 矛盾的是，禁酒反而导致酗酒的增加。

synos.tran: 自相矛盾地；似非而是地；反常地

words.tran: 矛盾的；诡论的；似非而是的
悖论，反论；似非而是的论点；自相矛盾的人或事

trans.tranOther: in a way that is surprising because it is the opposite of what you would expect
